- [ Hypervisor ](/documentation/hypervisor)

Function# hv_vm_config_get_default_ipa_granule(_:)

macOS 26.0+

```
func hv_vm_config_get_default_ipa_granule(_ granule: UnsafeMutablePointer<hv_ipa_granule_t>) -> hv_return_t
```

## [ Parameters ](/documentation/Hypervisor/hv_vm_config_get_default_ipa_granule(_:)#parameters)

`granule`Pointer to the default intermediate physical address granule size (written on success).

## [Return Value](/documentation/Hypervisor/hv_vm_config_get_default_ipa_granule(_:)#return-value)

HV_SUCCESS on success, an error code otherwise.

## [Discussion](/documentation/Hypervisor/hv_vm_config_get_default_ipa_granule(_:)#discussion)

Return the default intermediate physical address granule.
